title: PIPES; JOINTS OR FITTINGS FOR PIPES; SUPPORTS FOR PIPES, CABLES OR PROTECTIVE TUBING; MEANS FOR THERMAL INSULATION IN GENERAL
informative_references: Watering gardens, fields, sports grounds, or the like, e.g. perforated pipe-linesVacuum cleaners, e.g. corrugated hoses; leaning machines, e.g. hose connections combined with electrical contacts, steam hoses with cables for steam ironingConnectors in the medical field, e.g. cathetersFire fighting; fire fighting hoses; sprinkler systemsMicro/macro connectors, e.g. for lab on chipSprayersCleaning of pipesAir conditioning ducts in vehiclesFuel conduits in vehicles, connections to LPG tankFixing of hoses or cables in motors vehiclesArrangement of piping or air hoses for brake systemsPipe laying shipsContainers/bags/vessels/tanks Connections to containers in general; Closing strapsBends for conveying concreteWear protection for bends for conveying concreteLPG couplings/filling nozzles/ Transferring fluids, e.g. fuel from bulk to vehicles or portable containersDispensing fluids, e.g. filling bottles or cansFastening of pipes or cables to bridgesCouplings for dredgersDomestic plumbing: shower hoses; toilet installations; drainage; Sewage, , , Downpipes for roof drainage, fixing means thereforeVertical ducts, channels in buildings, e.g. chimneysFluid concrete transportAir ducts for ventilation of mines or tunnels, connections thereforeSuspension devices for tubes or the like in mines or tunnelsExhaust pipesAir intake in motor engines, e.g. ducts between motor and filterFixing devices, e.g. hollow screwsValvesConduits, junctions for lubrication systemsConnections to gas tanksPipelines/pipe systemsWater tubes of steam boilersJoints, connection for chimneys or fluesHot water systems, central heating, e.g. distributors for heating built up from modulesDucting arrangements for air-conditioningHeat exchangersSealing elements into header boxes or end plates of heat-exchangersPipes in nuclear reactorsInstallation of electric cables, e.g. cable or pipe binders, cable or pipe channels
special_rules: Classification is not allocated when the features in the document concerning this subclass are obviously of no technical value, or a mere reference (e.g. if in a document it is mentioned that the connection can be also made by gluing, welding, screwing... without a further relevant technical information)Documents mainly concerning the material of the pipe or hose are classified in main groups  or There is a horizontal indexing scheme for further details not related to a specific CPC group:Uses or applications of pigs or moles Special arrangements for pipe couplings
definition_statement: This place covers: Methods and machines for laying pipes ( ) Devices to support, fix or hold pipes ( ) Pipes: conduits of closed cross-section which are specially adapted to convey fluids, material or objects (  and  ) Joints between pipes (  -  ,  ,  ) Energy and noise absorbers associated with pipes ( - ) Means for stopping flow from or in pipes ( - ) Devices for covering leaks in pipes ( - ) Pipe pigs primarily for repairing pipes ( - ) Protection of pipes against wear, heat, cracking, buckling and corrosion (  and  ) Thermal insulation of pipes, or in general, e.g. when no other special application of the insulation is given ( ) Tubular bodies that are not used to carry fluid, material or objects, e.g. pipes for scaffoldings, or furniture are only classified in the associated field, e.g. scaffoldings or furniture. If the pipe or connection is adapted for a specific use, it is only classified in the use field (e.g. medical connectors, microconnectors or vacuum cleaners) Documents that concern the specific material or a specific use for thermal insulation are classified in the specific fields for the material or use (e.g. fridges, building panels or motor compartments) The class is divided in the following main groups  Laying of pipes  Fixation of pipes  Pipes passing through walls  Pipe support inside other pipes  Rigid pipes  Hoses (the product)  Non-disconnectable pipe-joints (not made of plastic material)  Screw-threaded joints  Sealing by fluid pressure  Connection of pipes with swivel nuts  Male-female couplings  Flanged joints  Special types of connections for pipes (not in  - )  Adjustable joints (e.g. for allowing movements)  Joints with cut-off means  Connection of two hoses or two flexible sleeves  Connection of hoses to rigid members  Safety connections of hoses  Quick-acting couplings  Multiple/double-walled joints of fittings for pipes or hoses  Branching pipes or joining pipes to walls or pipes  Bends  Pipe units with apertures  Connection of plastic pipes; Connectors made of plastic  Connection of pipes or to pipes of brittle material  Expansion compensation devices (e.g. thermal expansion)  Heating/cooling pipes or pipe-systems  Energy absorbers, noise absorbers, means for plugging pipes, pigs, repairing pipes etc.  Protection of pipes, e.g. against external/internal damage or wear  Protection of pipes against corrosion of incrustation (e.g. by coatings)  Thermal insulations

title: Laying or reclaiming pipes; Repairing or joining pipes on or under water

title: Protection of pipes or objects of similar shape against external or internal damage or wear  ({protection under water F16L1/123;} supporting of pipes inside other pipes or sleeves F16L7/00; used in connection with end fittings of hoses F16L35/00; protection thereof during transport B65D59/00)
informative_references: For tubular articles not conveying fluid

title: against wear  (F16L57/04 takes precedence)
informative_references: Wear protection of pipes conveying material in bulk, e.g. concrete

title: Protection of pipes or pipe fittings against corrosion or incrustation  (compound tubes F16L9/14)
informative_references: Supporting of pipes inside other pipes or sleeves Cleaning pipes or tubesCathodic corrosion protection

title: by means of internal or external coatings
informative_references: Coatings for thermal insulationMethods or machines for applying coatings,

title: Coatings characterised by the materials used  (F16L58/16 takes precedence)
informative_references: Compositions of coatings

title: the coating being in the form of a bandage
informative_references: Apparatus for covering cores by winding

title: specially adapted for pipe fittings
informative_references: Non-disconnectible joints of coated pipesScrew joints for coated pipes comprising pipes with collars or flanges

title: Thermal insulation in general
definition_statement: This place covers: Thermal insulation for pipes or hoses or pipe cover elements, or in general, e.g. when no other special application of the insulation is given. This group does not cover materials for thermal insulation, which are classified in the specific groups for the materials.

title: {with a hinge opposite the slit}
definition_statement: This place covers: DE202005004339U

title: Arrangements using an air layer or vacuum
definition_statement: This place covers: Arrangements using an air layer or vacuum, air meaning any type of gas

title: Arrangements for supporting insulation from the wall or body insulated, e.g. by means of spacers between pipe and heat-insulating material; Arrangements specially adapted for supporting insulated bodies
informative_references: Pipe supports allowing movement in axial direction

title: {for pipes passing through walls or partitions}
informative_references: Devices for use where pipes, cables or protective tubing pass through walls or partition in general

title: {in which the temperature of the medium is below that of the ambient temperature  (rigid pipes of wood F16L9/006; vacuum insulation F16L59/065)}
definition_statement: This place covers: insulation for pipes conveying cryogenic fluids

title: Arrangements specially adapted to local requirements at flanges, junctions, valves or the like
informative_references: Means in or on valves for heating or cooling

title: {covering the end of an insulated section}
definition_statement: This place covers: US6752176

title: adapted for expansion-compensation devices
informative_references: Expansion-compensation arrangements for pie-lines
